index.title: Automate your delivery service and help!
index.subtitle: With apomap automate, you can define your internal delivery service processes and then forget about them!

connect.title: Connect interface
connect.subtitle: With one step, you can connect your POS system to apomap and automatically import orders

define.title: Define processes
define.subtitle: You can digitally define your internal delivery service process in apomap in an intuitive way. The command interface, the drag-and-drop interface, and keyboard commands make it really fast

automate.title: Carry out deliveries
automate.subtitle: Your defined processes are now running automatically and you can use the apomap driver app to deliver packages to your messenger

command.placeholder: ⌘K - Type what you want to do!
